title: Ep 234 | Phil Gives Out His Address on TV, When Miss Kay Decided to Marry Phil & Fake Power Couples
description:
Phil recalls the surprise when he gave his address out on national television. Phil, Jase, and Al tell the stories of their very first encounters with their wives, and Phil remembers Miss Kay making the first move. Jase wants to redefine the term "power couple" after hearing Al's sermon. Phil explains what couples have to do to become true power couples. And the guys talk about Priscilla and Aquila's marriage.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
